name: Ground Parkour: First Mission
description:
Ground parkour: First Mission, where there are many obstacles and will help you cope with the obstacles.
It is a fun game full of supporting characters and also has a multiplayer system. In the game, you can try to complete the track either online or offline and have new characters. But you should remember that everything is not as easy as it seems. Obstacles can mislead you and get on your nerves. For this reason, always be careful and alert.

The environment of the game is the construction site in the city. Players can have characters with many different themes. For example; You can have many characters such as a worker, a commoner, a boss, an assistant, and add fun to your entertainment with their abilities in the game.

Additionally, the lack of a save function in the game increases the difficulty of finishing the game. You won't get a second chance. Even the slightest misstep can take you back to square one. But your character has different features that will give you an advantage. Depending on the body structure of the characters, some can run fast, some can walk fast, and some can jump high.

Don't be intimidated by the moving obstacles in the game, because your characters are designed to overcome them. Within the map environment; There are moving obstacles, elevators, small and large obstacles, and while these obstacles sometimes give you an advantage, sometimes they can create a disadvantage. There are also objects on the map that will help you jump higher. By using these objects correctly, you can reach the finish point in a shorter time.

Playing the game alone may be boring, so you can increase your fun by inviting your friends.




- You can play with your friends with Online Mode.



- Auxiliary items that will easily take you to heights



- Characters with different physical characteristics.



- Many different categories and characters with different physical characteristics.


Ground parkour: First Mission, in short, you compete with yourself to reach the highest point on the track with different characters and different abilities in a construction site in the city. Each character has different abilities and you progress on this track full of obstacles. Your goal is to reach the finish line at the highest point. Enjoy!
